September 13, 2018 <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/for-it-pros-working-in-government-and-the-armed-forces-springone-platform-is-an-essential-conference-heres-your-agenda?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> For IT Pros Working in Government and the Armed Forces, SpringOne Platform 2018 is an Essential Conference Digital transformation is on the mind of federal agencies everywhere, and SpringOne Platform 2018 is an essential component of the journey. Learn how others have successfully achieved better outcomes with software, dig into specifics of cultural transformation, get ideas on how to harness the power of containers and application platforms and more, all at one event. Here's Your Agenda <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/for-it-pros-working-in-government-and-the-armed-forces-springone-platform-is-an-essential-conference-heres-your-agenda?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/monoliths-to-microservices?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Monoliths to Microservices How do you get from a monolith to a microservice? Pivot Denise Yu breaks it down in this comic. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/monoliths-to-microservices?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/that-moment-episode-8-we-had-to-take-a-step-back-and-question-our-biases?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> "We Had To Take a Step Back and Question Our Biases" That Moment, our Shorty-award nominated podcast, is back with a new season, new format, and a new host! To kick off this season we discuss the counterintuitive nature behind latrine design for refugee camps with two Pivotal designers, and then we talk to BuzzFeed’s security advisor about how he helps journalists report from—and survive—conflict zones. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/that-moment-episode-8-we-had-to-take-a-step-back-and-question-our-biases?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/what-we-did-on-our-summer-internship-at-pivotal-discovery-and-framing?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> What We Did on Our Summer Internship at Pivotal: Discovery and Framing What do you do as a summer intern at Pivotal? Two of our summer interns deep dive into their summer project.
